General.Name: Hainan Development Holdings Nanhai Co Ltd
General.Description: Hainan Development HoldingsNanhai Co., Ltd. operates curtain wall and interior decoration engineering, photovoltaic glass, and special glass deep processing business in China. It engages in research, development, design, construction, and installation of architectural curtain walls, architectural doors and windows, and steel structures; and offers architectural curtain wall engineering services. The company also provides Low-E coated energy-saving, IT thin, aviation, high-speed rail, fireproof and explosion-proof, and ultra-clear solar glasses; and produces and sells building curtain wall units, energy-saving doors, and windows and related products. In addition, it offers technology development; production and sales of glass deep-processing products; and mining, washing, selection, processing, and sale of various refined quartz sand products, as well as operates foreign glass project contracting, and glass technology and equipment export business. The company was formerly known as AVIC Sanxin Co., Ltd. Hainan Development HoldingsNanhai Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
